abstract: Willingness of United States Marine Corps to accept female recruits is questioned after Lt Col Kate Germano is relieved of command of all-women boot camp at Parris Island; corps says dismissal was not related to gender and that two internal investigations found she had disobeyed chain of command and mistreated subordinates.
lead_paragraph: The dismissal of Lt. Col. Kate Germano has raised questions over the corps’ willingness to open the door to women in leadership roles.

headline.main: Marine Commander’s Firing Stirs Debate on Integration of Women in Corps
headline.print_headline: Marine Commander’s Firing Stirs Debate on Integration

snippet: The dismissal of Lt. Col. Kate Germano has raised questions over the corps’ willingness to open the door to women in leadership roles.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
